article_title: Medicare's Bundled Payment Loses Some Interest Among Providers

article_metadata.description: Some 1,500 medical care providers are moving forward to accept bundled payments from the Medicare health insurance program for the elderly, but that’s just 25% of those that first expressed interest in a voluntary effort, a new analysis by health research firm Avalere Health shows. The decrease in participation comes as [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
